body.p: News from the release building effort for 2005.0, infrastructure moves and changes, a heads-up for shifting sys-apps in the tree and a call for business user testimonials dominate this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. The featured developer section is back from several months of hiatus, this week with the maintainer of Gentoo's package database site, and the Gentoo International section carries two important reminders for shows in the UK and Germany next weekend, and a report from another expo in Germany that closed yesterday. Starting this week, the GWN has moved the security announcements and the Bugzilla statistics to the end of the newsletter, and besides the Gentoo in the press clippings we also have a tip on using emerge in clever ways you may not be familiar with.
